name: Pond Scum: A Gothic Swamp Tale
name_original: Pond Scum: A Gothic Swamp Tale
description:
At the edge of the Deep Swamp stands Snappy and his gang.
Anxious to proceed, they press on as a rite of passage for all young pond dwellers.
What will they find ahead?
Uncover the secrets of the swamp in this Diorama-based VR Platformer.

🐊🐊

Features


  • Jump, die and journey across 5 unique worlds packed with 30+ levels
  • Solve puzzles while dodging the twisted creatures of the Deep Swamp
  • Collect all the Golden Fangs!
  • Enjoy our original music fresh from the Garden
  • Delve into the dark, introspective tale of Snappy
  • Meet new friends and eat old ones
  • Call your mother!!!
  • Lose yourself in the marsh

🐊🐊

Wishlist Pond Scum: A Gothic Swamp Tale today!
